mapper.insert: insert into fiction_extention (logic_code, fiction_code, full_desc, total_chapter, last_update_time, level, fiction_views, last_chapter_name, last_chapter_Code, create_time, modify_time, create_user_code, modify_user_code, is_delete,fiction_score,fiction_score_num,total_word ) values (#{logicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fictionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalChapter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fictionViews,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastChapterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastChapterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fictionScore},#{fictionScoreNum},#{totalWord} )
mapper.update: update fiction_extention set logic_code = #{logicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fiction_code = #{fictionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, full_desc = #{fullDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_chapter = #{totalChapter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fiction_views = #{fictionViews,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_chapter_name = #{lastChapterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_chapter_code = #{lastChapterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_code = #{createUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_code = #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fiction_score = #{fictionScore}, fiction_score_num = #{fictionScoreNum}, total_word = #{totalWord} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fiction_extention
fiction_views = #{fictionViews,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_chapter_name = #{lastChapterName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_chapter_code = #{lastChapterCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modify_user_code = #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fiction_score = #{fictionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fiction_score_num = #{fictionScoreNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_word = #{totalWord,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where fiction_code = #{fictionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cid, logic_code, fiction_code, full_desc, total_chapter, last_update_time, level, fiction_views, last_chapter_name, last_chapter_code, create_time, modify_time, fiction_score,fiction_score_num,total_word, create_user_code, modify_user_code, is_delete from fiction_extention where fiction_code = #{fictionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select cid, logic_code, fiction_code, full_desc, total_chapter, last_update_time, fiction_score, fiction_score_num,total_word,level, fiction_views, last_chapter_name, last_chapter_code, create_time, modify_time, create_user_code, modify_user_code, is_delete from fiction_extention
